Module QemuJuicy
Package qemujuicy.ui

Class Gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • qemujuicy.ui.Gui
  • public class Gui
extends Object
    Utility class for the GUI (Graphical User Interface), supporting the project's GUI with several static methods.

    • Method Detail

      • blockingConfirmDlg

        public static void blockingConfirmDlg​(String message,
                                      String title)
        Blocks the current thread until a message dialog is confirmed. Uses SwingUtilities.invokeAndWait() and JOptionPane.showMessageDialog() to do this.
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        title - the title of the dialog
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if called on the event dispatch thread

      • center

        public static void center​(Window window)
        Centers a window (JFrame, JDialog, etc.) on the screen.
        Parameters:
        window - the window object (JFrame, JDialog, etc.) to center

      • createDefaultToolBar

        public static JToolBar createDefaultToolBar()
        Creates a default toolbar with default properties.
        Returns:
        the JToolBar

      • enableComponents

        public static void enableComponents​(Container container,
                                    boolean enable)
        Enable/disable a container and all contained components recursively.
        Parameters:
        container -
        enable - true to enable, flase otherwise

      • requestFocus

        public static void requestFocus​(JComponent component)
        Request the focus of a component using .
        Parameters:
        component - the JComponent to get the focus

      • setDefaultEmptyBorder

        public static void setDefaultEmptyBorder​(JComponent component)
        Sets an EmptyBorder (display the background only) with the default Gbc border inset, usually for a JPanel of a JFrame.
        Parameters:
        component - the JComponent object to receive the border
